CatDescriptText: Related images published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 13, 1965, pg. 7 reads: "D.I.'s Crown Mardi Gras King, Queen at Hilton"
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of man and woman wearing costumes, including man on left wearing pants with one rolled up leg, a man's and woman's shoe, halter dress with ruffled skirt attached to a backward suit jacket, cat mask, tiara, and hat, holding dark fur muff and stick, standing in Hilton Hotel for the D.I.'s Mardi Gras Ball
